Params.Param: with nodes (id) as (select id from BSE_Node where id={NodeId} union all select inn.id from BSE_Node inn inner join nodes on inn.parentfk=nodes.id) SELECT AL2.ID, AL2.FinalSubject SUBJECT, AL2.Created CREATED, ALS.caption as MAXSTATE FROM ( SELECT id, FinalSubject, created, Max(state) MState, MAX(FORME) FORME,ALARMDEFINITIONFK FROM ( SELECT AL.ID, AL.FinalSubject as FinalSubject, ALS.ID as State, AL.Created as Created, (CASE WHEN ALD.ADDRESSINCHANNEL='{CurrentIdentityId}' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FORME, AL.ALARMDEFINITIONFK AS ALARMDEFINITIONFK FROM BSE_AlarmLog AL LEFT OUTER JOIN BSE_AlarmLogDelivery ALD ON ALD.alarmlogfk = AL.id LEFT OUTER JOIN BSE_AlarmLogState ALS ON ALS.id = ALD.alarmlogstatefk LEFT OUTER JOIN BSE_AlarmChannel ALC ON ALC.id = ALS.alarmchannelfk WHERE ALC.[KEY] = 'Window' ) X GROUP BY id, FinalSubject, created, ALARMDEFINITIONFK ) AL2 LEFT OUTER JOIN BSE_AlarmLogState ALS ON AL2.MState = ALS.ID INNER JOIN ( select BSE_Alarmnode.alarmdeffk from nodes join BSE_Nodeother on parentnodefk=nodes.id and conname='CTAlarmNode' join BSE_Alarmnode on BSE_Nodeother.childnodeid=BSE_Alarmnode.id ) as VISIBLE_DEFINITIONS ON VISIBLE_DEFINITIONS.alarmdeffk=AL2.ALARMDEFINITIONFK ORDER BY CREATED DESC Exp;string CurrentIdentityId=CurrentIdentity.IdentityId.ToString()
